text:
Data Policy 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 Jump to Sections of this page Accessibility Help Press  alt  +  /  to open this menu Facebook Email or Phone Password Forgot account? Sign Up Data Policy  → Interactive Tools   Interactive Tools  Preview your profile  Learn to preview how your profile looks to the public or to a specific person that you choose.  Preview your public search profile  See an example of what people see when they look for you using public search engines.  Applications you use  See what permissions you've given the applications you use, as well as the last time those applications accessed your information.  Download your information  Download a copy of everything you've put into Facebook, all in one, easy to browse file.  Target an ad  Try the same tool some of our advertisers use to target ads on Facebook and see how relevant ads are served without your information being shared with advertisers.  Graph API  See what information is available about you to developers and others who access our Graph API.
